articles.title: Inflation: Cost of living up despite Covid Christmas curbs - BBC News
articles.description: The UK inflation rate jumps to 0.6% in December from 0.3% in November, led by higher transport costs.
articles.content:
Prices rose at a faster rate in the UK in December, despite Covid curbs that forced non-essential shops to shut.
